cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplateDisplayName: E-commerce - Order status notification to customer

Status of your order has changed.

The status of your order has changed to '{% Order.OrderStatus.DisplayName|(encode)true |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)64f259dde21f8e6efe7c41a6525b41fd2fdff5ebc76dd0dfb9003a9f9ecf6625%}'.
